snippet.title: Title: Ferrimagnetic spin-1/2 chain of alternating Ising and Heisenberg spins in arbitrarily oriented magnetic field
snippet.description:
Title: Ferrimagnetic spin-1/2 chain of alternating Ising and Heisenberg spins in arbitrarily oriented magnetic field
Authors: J. Strecka, M. Hagiwara, Y. Han, T. Kida, Z. Honda, M. Ikeda
Comments: 11 pages, 6 figures
Journal-ref: Condens. Matter Phys., 2012, vol. 15, No. 4, 43002:1-11
Subjects: Statistical Mechanics (cond-mat.stat-mech); Strongly Correlated Electrons (cond-mat.str-el); Mathematical Physics (math-ph)

snippet.title: Title: Effect of magnetic field in heavy-fermion compound YbCo$_2$Zn$_{20}$
snippet.description:
Title: Effect of magnetic field in heavy-fermion compound YbCo$_2$Zn$_{20}$
